variable.label: QoS Function
variable.tooltip: Function number which enables saving of QoS and Temperature value in CV216 ÷ CV219"

factReset.label: HARD RESET all CVs reset to default values
HARD RESET všechny CV se resetují na výchozí hodnoty

label.text: This decoder supports two different function mapping solutions. The standard mapping and an extended function mapping.
The standard mapping is managed from the function mapping tab. The extended function mapping is managed from this tab
The extended function mapping allows to set two functions per output, with direction control.
It also can set a specific function to disable the output
n (n<=28) - Function number "n" will turn on
n+ 128 (n<=28) - Function number "n" will turn on in reverse direction only
n+ 64 (n<=28) - Function number "n" will turn on in forward direction only
n + 192 (n<=28) - output is always turned on
Train-O-Matic (tOm) decoders support a decoder locking feature
Train-O-Matic (tOm) dekodéry podporují funkci zamykání dekodéru,
useful when several decoders are used in one loco
která je užitečná, když je v jedné lokomotivě na stejné adrese
on the same address, e.g. for adding sound
použito více dekodérů, např. pro přidání zvuku.
Set CV15 equal to this number to unlock the decoder for programming
Nastavte CV15 na toto číslo, abyste odemkli dekodér pro programování
Toggling the QoS Function will read the quality of DCC signal and internal temperature
